title.narrative: Technical Assistance for Banking and Financial Services

description.narrative: Develop and implement programs to increase Nigeria Deposit Insurance Corporation (NDIC) staff capacity in Risk Based Supervision. Train NDIC staff in programs and methods to improve the capacity in claims resolution. Increase Asset Management capacity in various core areas (e.g. Loan Valuation, Purchase and Assumption, Asset Administration, Real Estate Management, and Problem Loan Workout).Develop core competencies in Enterprise Risk Management(risk assessment, monitoring, control and reporting techniques). Assist the NDIC in implementing International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS).

activity-date.narrative: Date unavailable. Calculated start date is the earliest transaction date
Date unavailable. Calculated end date is the latest transaction date

person-name.narrative: Andrew Velthaus, Jennifer Lee, and Kelley Vito

title.narrative: Technical Assistance for Nigeria - Banking and Financial Services

description.narrative: Establish and document processes and procedures for audit in support of transition to self-assessment; provide assistance in collection of arrears.

title.narrative: Technical Assistance for Nigeria - Banking and Financial Services

description.narrative: The advisor(s) are working to develop and implement programs to increase NDIC staff capacity in Risk Based Supervision. Training is being provided to NDIC staff in programs and methods to improve the capacity in claims resolution. Increase Asset Management capacity in various core areas (e.g. Loan Valuation, Purchase and Assumption, Asset Administration, Real Estate Management, and Problem Loan Workout). The advisor(s) are also assisting the NDIC in implementing International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS).
